SpellModifyFeature.Name: Tempest Spell
SpellModifyFeature.Text: When you cast a spell that requires an attack roll and deals lightning or thunder damage, you may spend 1 sorcery point when you deal damage to a creature to push the creature up to 15 feet.
SpellModifyFeature.Prerequisite: You must have the Storm Sorcery sorcerous origin to take this option.
